profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontsha ya ntlha fa thoko ga phetolelo
profile.filterExplicit: Sefa diteng tse di sa tshwanelang
profile.allowExplicitContent: Letla diteng tse di sa tshwanelang

profile.saveError: Phoso: Ga e kgone go boloka dipeakanyo

profile.importFailed: Go tsenya senotlolo go retetse (phasewete e phoso kgotsa faele e senyegile).

profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo ya senotlolo e e tsidifatsitsweng
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa gago sa poraefete ga se tswe mo sedirisweng seno. Romela khopi e e sireleditsweng ka phasewete go kgona go busetsa mo sedirisweng se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O mo go Free‚Äîdirisa dikgetho tsa Letsatsi/Ngwedi fa tlase. Ntlhatlosa go bula dithemeng tse dingwe.
profile.backupTitle: Dibekapo tse di Tsidifatsitsweng & Go Tsamaisanya Didiriswa
profile.backupDesc: Dirang dibekapo tse di sireleditsweng ka phasewete tsa dinotlolo, mme lo di busetse mo sedirisweng se sengwe go tsamaisanya.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pudufatsa fa app e sa tlhokomelwe
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntsiisa tshedimosetso fa molaetsa wa me o kopiwa
profile.unfollowFailed: Go paletswe go emisa go latela
profile.followHint: Dikgang tsa bone di tla bonala mo phatlhalatsong ya ‚ÄòO a Latela‚Äô fa ba beile ‚ÄòBalateli‚Äô kgotsa ‚ÄòSephatlo‚Äô.

profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Go Fetisetsa Meletso le/ kgotsa Difouno
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa meletso le difouno tse di tsenang kwa founong kgotsa imeiling e e netefaditsweng. Difouno/melaetsa e e tswang e ka bontsha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.

profile.errSmsDest: Tlhopha bonnye sebaka se le sengwe (founo kgotsa imeile).
profile.errQuietHours: Diura tsa boitshepho di tshwanetse go nna fa gare ga 0 le 23.

auth.headline: Melaetsa ya lefatshe ka bophara e e sireletsegileng ka phetolelo ya nako-ya-nnete

feature.disappearing: Melaetsa e e nyelelang & diresiti tsa go buisa

feature.privacyAlt: Moralo o o tsayang sephiri pele

auth.subhead: Melaetsa e e poraefete, e e sireleditsweng, e bile e fetolelwa ‚Äî ka bonako.
auth.tip: Keletso: Dirisa akhaonto e le nngwe mo webeng le mo mojareng. Melaetsa ya gago e a tsamaisana.
auth.scanHint: Skena go kopolola app kgotsa bula mo sebrowsereng.

footer.doNotSell: O seka wa rekisa Tshedimosetso ya me

links.do-not-sell-my-info: O seka wa rekisa Tshedimosetso ya me

press.title: Bodiragatsi
press.contactLine: Bakopi ba kgolagano ba ka re fitlha mo
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ke app ya melaetsa e e tsayang sephiri pele e e dirang puisano ya maleme a mantsi e nne bonolo. Melaetsa e a sirelediwa ka ntlha-le-ntlha ka tlwaelo, mme phetolelo e a tshegetswa maleme a 100+ ka nako-ya-nnete. Badirisi ba ka bulela melaetsa e e nyelelang, ba dire diresiti tsa go buisa di le boikgethelo, mme ba tsamaisanye didiriswa. E teng mo iOS, Android, le web.
press.assetsSubtitle: Dilitshwao, ditshedimosetso tsa skrini, le ditshwantsho tsa sehlahisoa.
press.scanTip: Mo khomphiutareng? Skena ka founo go tsaya app.

careers.title: Me≈°omo
careers.intro: Re sehlopha se sennye se se agang molaetsa wa poraefete, wa lefatshe ka bophara. Fa o kgathala ka encryption, go tsena motlhofo, le UX e e itumedisang, re itumelela go utlwa ka wena.
careers.openRoles: Mesomo e bulegileng: Boenjineri (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Tshegetso.

about.title: Ka ga Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke molaetsa o o sireletsegileng, wa maleme a mantsi, ka encryption ya ntlha-le-ntlha, phetolelo ya bonako, le difouno tsa lentswe/levidio. Maikaelelo a rona a motlhofo: go thusa batho go golagana‚Äîka tshireletso, ka sephiri, le mo malemeng otlhe.

values.privacy: <bold>Sephiri pele:</bold> Encryption ya ntlha-le-ntlha ka tlwaelo.
values.access: <bold>Go fitlhelela go botlhe:</bold> Phetolelo ya maleme a 100+ ka go iketsa.
values.control: <bold>Taolo:</bold> Melaetsa e e nyelelang & diresiti tsa go buisa ke boikgethelo.
values.privacy_aria: Sephiri pele: Encryption ya ntlha-le-ntlha ka tlwaelo.
values.access_aria: Go fitlhelela go botlhe: Phetolelo ya maleme a 100+.
values.control_aria: Taolo: Melaetsa e e nyelelang le diresiti tsa go buisa ke boikgethelo.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e a sirelediwa mo sedirisweng sa gago pele e tsamaya. Phetolelo, dibekapo, le go tsamaisanya di rulagantswe go fokotsa se seva e ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Papatso le Chatforia
advertise.description: Fitlha babogedi ba melaetsa ka diphatlalatso tse di nang le seriti. Re na le dibhanara mo mafelong a a bonalang, botshepegi, le dipapatso tsa rona. Babereki ba Premium ga ba bone dipapatso.

adsense.withPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Fa o batla go re ikaeletsa ka Google Ads, dirisa ID ya motshameki {{pubId}} mme o kope managed placement mo diyuniting tse di fa tlase. Ditshegetso tse di tobileng di a tshwanetse‚Äîdirisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Ditshegetso tse di tobileng le tsone di teng‚Äîdirisa foromo e e fa tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ga go ise go rulaganywe mafelo a dipapatso. Akenya mo ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Matsapa a mangwe a go tsena le go nna mo UI ya puisano
why.brandSafe: Diformete tse di sireletsegileng; tekanyetso ya makgetlo a pontsho e a tlhokomelwa
why.sponsoredMoments: Dikgato tse di tshegeditsweng (sekai, ‚ÄúSimolola Puisano‚Äù modal) di teng
why.deals: Ditheko ka tlhamalalo kgotsa ka AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Re leboga! Kopo ya gago e rometswe. Re tla araba ka bonako.
form.missingRequired: Tsweetswee tlatsa leina, imeile, le molaetsa.
form.successToast: Re leboga! Re tla ikgolaganya le wena ka bonako.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula moromisi wa imeile go romela kopo‚Ä¶
form.messageLabel: Re bolelele ka kgwebo ya gago
form.messagePlaceholder: Go ikaeletsa, matsatsi, KPI, dikgetho tsa mafelo‚Ä¶

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka go romela, o dumalana le

upgrade.title: Ntlhatlosa
upgrade.subtitle: Bula leano le le go siametseng: tlosang dipapatso ka Plus, kgotsa tsaya ditsweletso tsotlhe ka Premium.
upgrade.benefitsLine: Bula ditsweletso tsa maatla & tlosang dipapatso.

scheduleBanner.title: Suipeishene e tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: O tla boela mo go Free ka

plus.title: Plus
plus.desc: Tlhaolelo e e theko e e kwa tlase e se na dipapatso.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Kgweding)
premiumMonthly.desc: Ditsweletso tsotlhe, ditiro tsa ditalana, le didiriswa tsa AI.

features.ringtones: Ditalana tsa founo & melodi ya melaetsa

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Ngwaga)
premiumAnnual.desc: Boloka mo go fa o duela ngwaga.

features.save25: Boloka ~25% fa o bapisa le kgweding
features.sameFeatures: Ditsweletso di tshwana le tsa Kgweding

premiumAnnual.disclaimer: E duelwa pele. Khansela nako nngwe le nngwe. Ga gona ditshenyegelo tse di fitlhelegileng.

marketing.plusDesc: Tlhaolelo e e theko e e kwa tlase e se na dipapatso.
marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Ditsweletso tsotlhe, ditalana, le didiriswa tsa AI.
marketing.premiumAnnualDesc: Boloka go feta fa o duelwa ngwaga.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: E duelwa pele. Khansela nako nngwe le nngwe. Ga gona ditshenyegelo tse di fitlhelegileng.

gettingStarted.title: Go Simolola
gettingStarted.subtitle: O mosha mo Chatforia? Keletso e khutshwane e go bontsha dilo tsa botlhokwa mo metsotsong.

alert.text: Tataiso e tla gola fa re tsepamisetsa ditsweletso tse dintsha. Fa go na le sengwe se se tlhokegang, re itsise ka

section1.title: 1) Bopa akhaonto ya gago
section1.loginText: ka akhaonto e o nang nayo.

section2.title: 2) Simolola go romela melaetsa
section2.item1: Tlhama DM kgotsa Setlhopha mme o romele molaetsa wa ntlha.
section2.item2: Dirisa phetolelo ya bonako go bua ka maleme a 100+.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e e nyelelang le diresiti mo Profailo ‚Üí Sephiri.

section3.title: 3) Tswelela pele
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = se na dipapatso, Premium = ditsweletso tsotlhe).
section3.item2Part1: Golaganya didiriswa tse dingwe mme o rulaganye dibekapo mo

account.q: Nka bopa kgotsa ke busetsa jang akhaonto?
account.a: Kopolola app kgotsa dirisa wepe, tobetsa ‚ÄúBopa akhaonto‚Äù, netefatsa imeile/founo. Go busetsa, dirisa ‚ÄúO lebetse phasewete‚Äù.

privacy.q: A melaetsa e sireletsegile ka ntlha-le-ntlha?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetsa le difouno di sireletsegile ka ntlha-le-ntlha ka tlwaelo. Ke wena le moamogedi fela lo ka e buisang.

translate.q: Phetolelo ya bonako e dira jang?
translate.a: Bulela ‚ÄúFetolela ka go iketsa‚Äù mo Dipeakanyo ‚Üí Ponalo & Leleme. Re fetolela mo sedirisweng fa go kgonega, kgotsa ka API tse di sireletsegileng ka metadata e nnye.

contact.a: Re fitlhe mo support@chatforia.com. Akaretsa disekirini le mofuta wa app.

contact.title: Ikgolaganye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Re leboga‚Äîsehlopha se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ga e a kgona go romela. Tsweetswee romela imeile kwa support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi eno e tlhalosa gore Chatforia (‚Äúrona‚Äù) e bokanya, e dirisa, le go abelana tshedimosetso jang fa o dirisa diaropo le ditshebeletso tsa rona. Re rulaganya Chatforia go fokotsa datha e re ka e bonang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tshedimosetso e re e bokanyang
infoWeCollect.account: Tshedimosetso ya akhaonto (sekai, imeile/founo) go bopa le go sireletsa akhaonto ya gago.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Dikakantsho tse di sireleditsweng (melaetsa/difouno) di sireletsegile ka ntlha-le-ntlha; ga re kgone go di buisa.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ditlalelelo tsa bothata/tshebediso jaaka dikrash, mofuta wa sediriswa, kgotsa di-analytics tse di nnye go tokafatsa tshebetso.

howWeUse.title: Re dirisa tshedimosetso jang
howWeUse.provide: Go fana le go sireletsa tirelo (auth, go lemoga spam/tshenyo).
howWeUse.improve: Go tokafatsa ditsweletso (boleng jwa phetolelo, tsholofelo).

sharing.title: Go abelana
sharing.body: Ga re reki datha ya batho. Re ka abelana datha e nnye le badirisi ba ditirelo (sekai, ditseka tsa push, di-analytics) ka dikonteraka tse di thata.

rights.title: Ditshwanelo tsa gago
rights.body: Go ikaegile ka sebaka sa gago (sekai, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), o ka kopa go tsena, go siamisa, go phimola, kgotsa go ikgogela mo ditiragalong dingwe. Ikgolaganye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Go boloka datha & tshireletso
retention.body: Re boloka fela se se tlhokegang go dira tirelo mme re dirisa tshireletso ya maemo a indasteri. Datha ya ntlha-le-ntlha ga re kgone go e buisa.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ga e reeditse bana ba ba kwa tlase ga 13 (kgotsa go ya ka molao wa sebaka sa gago).

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re tla baya ditokafatso fano mme re nt≈°hwafaditse letsatsi la ‚ÄúE nt≈°hwafaditswe‚Äù.

intro.body: Ka go dirisa Chatforia o dumalana le Melao eno. Fa o sa dumele, o se ka wa dirisa tirelo.

accounts.title: Diakhaonto
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Neela tshedimosetso e e boammaaruri mme o sireletse ditshaeno.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O ikarabella ka se se diragalang mo akhaontong ya gago.

acceptableUse.title: Tiriso e e amogelesegang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ga go na diteng tse di seng molaong, tse di tlhaselang, kgotsa tse di robang ditokelo; ga go spam kgotsa tiriso e e ikatisang.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/khansela ka ntlha ya tlolo ya melao.

yourContent.title: Diteng tsa gago
yourContent.body: O boloka ditokelo mo diteng tsa gago. O re naya ditumalano tse di tlhokegang go dira tirelo (sekai, go tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Ditshololo & maikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tirelo e fiwa ‚Äújaaka e ntse‚Äù ntle le ditsholofetso. Go ya ka molao, Chatforia ga e na maikarabelo ka dikotsi tse di sa tobang kgotsa ditlamorago.

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re ka nt≈°hwafatsa melao; go tswelela go dirisa morago ga diphetogo go raya go dumela.

doNotSell.title: O seka wa Rekisa kgotsa go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso ya me
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ga e reki tshedimosetso ya batho. Baagi ba California ba ka tswelela ba neelana ka dikopo go ya ka CPRA ka konopo e e fa tlase.

cookies.title: Dipeakanyo tsa Dikhukhi
cookies.body: Chatforia e dirisa dikhukhi tse di nnye (sekai, setlhopha, tshireletso). Ga re dirise dikhukhi tsa dipapatso tsa batho ba boraro. Laola dikhukhi mo dipeakanyong tsa sebrowsera sa gago.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ga e kgone go laisa boemo jwa nomoro ya founo.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ga go a abelwa nomoro. Tlhopha ka k√¥di ya lefelo go simolola go romela melaetsa.

startChatModal.title: Simolola puisano
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Thaepa leina, leina la modirisi, founo, kgotsa imeile‚Ä¶
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Simolola puisano le ba ba tlhophilweng
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Batla ka leina la modirisi kgotsa founo
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Thaepa leina la modirisi kgotsa founo mme o tobetsa Batla.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Dikwalo tsa founo/imeile di tla bonwa fa o di boloka jaaka dikontake.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Go paletswe go simolola puisano le ba ba tlhophilweng.
startChatModal.firstMessageOptional: Molaetsa wa ntlha (boikgethelo mme o a kgothalsadiwa)

sounds.freeNotice: O mo Free ‚Äî ditalana tsa boleng di a bontshiwa mme di tswaletswe. Ntlhatlosa go bula tsotlhe.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Tiragalo eno e batla Leano la Premium.

aiSettings.title: Dipeakanyo tsa AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Laola phetolelo, dikarabo tse di botlhokwa, le dikarabo tsa ForiaBot ka boiketsi.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Fetolela melaetsa e e tsenang ka go iketsa
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Bontsha ya ntlha fa thoko le phetolelo
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Romela melaetsa e mmalwa ya bofelo (e e hloekisitsweng) kwa AI go akantsha dikarabo ka bonako.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Fitlha mafoko a a sa siamang mo dikarabolong tsa AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Fa e le teng, dikarabo tse di tswang mo AI di tla fitlha mafoko a a tshwailweng
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Bula karabo-ka-boiketsi fa ke le pelotshetlha
aiSettings.saveFailed: Go paletswe go boloka dipeakanyo tsa AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Fa go na le @translated kgotsa go tshwailwe
aiSettings.translateAll: Fetolela melaetsa e e tsenang yotlhe

accessibilitySettings.title: Go tsena & Dikitsiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Dikgetho go dira Chatforia gore e nne motlhofo go dirisiwa le fa modumo o sa dirisiwe.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E simolola ka bogolo jo bo tlwaelegileng. Oketsa fa o batla ditlhaka tse dikgolo mo dipeakanyong tsa go tsena.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Dikitsiso tsa ponalo tsa melaetsa & difouno
Bontsha dibhanara le go phatsima ga setlhogo gore o se ka wa tlhokafalela tiro.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Dirileng fa go na le melaetsa e mesha (fa go tshegetswe)
Galefa sediriswa fa go na le kitsiso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Phatsima skrini fa go letsetsa
Phatsima e khutshwane fa founo e a lla.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Fetolela ka go iketsa ditshedimosetso tsa lentswe
Tsenya pampiri ya tlhaloso mo melaetseng ya audio e o e amogelang.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Dikitsiso tsa ponalo tsa melaetsa & difouno
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bontsha dibhanara le go phatsima ga setlhogo gore o seka wa tlhokafalela tiro.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Dirileng fa go na le melaetsa e mesha (fa go tshegetswe)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Phatsima e khutshwane fa founo e a lla.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Tshireletso e e thata ya ntlha-le-ntlha
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Boloka fela mo seva molaetsa o o sireleditsweng. E tima AI/Phetolelo le dipono tsa taolo.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Didiriswa tse di Golagantsweng
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Ga go a bonwa didiriswa tse di golagantsweng.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Batla ka leina la botsalano, leina, leina la modirisi, kgotsa founo
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ditsela di se kae tsa go simolola ka bonako.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Batla ka founo / leina la modirisi
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Abelana kgokaganyo ya tlotlo go simolola go bolela ka bonako.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Nna o golagana mo tseleng ka Chatforia ya iOS le Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Keletso: Melaetsa ya gago e tsamaisana mo webeng le mo mojareng.

randomChat.title: Puisano ka Serendipity
randomChat.description: Kopana le motho yo mosha ka bonako. Re tla go bapisa mme re bule phaposi ya nakwana.
randomChat.noPartner: Ga go nke ga bonwa molekane gone jaanong.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ke dipuisano tsa motho-go-motho fela tse di ka bolokwang

login.title: O amogetswe gape
login.subtitle: Tsena mo akhaontong ya gago ya Chatforia
login.googleUnavailable: Go tsena ka Google ga go gona
login.appleUnavailable: Go tsena ka Apple ga go gona
login.ssoUnavailable: SSO ga e gona ga jaana. Dirisa leina la modirisi & phasewete.

error.invalid: Leina la modirisi kgotsa phasewete ga di a siama
error.unprocessable: Kopo ga e a siama. Lekola leina la modirisi/imeile le phasewete.
error.deviceLimit: Paloganyo ya didiriswa e gorogile mo leano la Free. Tswa mo sedirisweng sengwe kgotsa ntlhatlosa go Premium go golaganya a mantsi.
error.premiumRequired: Tiro eno e batla leano la Premium.
